thread.title: Time to Fret About the Bet on Debt

author: James Mackintosh
title: Time to Fret About the Bet on Debt
text:
It’s easy to lend money. The trick to successful finance is getting it back—and lenders, egged on by politicians, are once again forgetting how hard it can be to recover debts in a downturn.
The Trump administration wants banks to be less regulated, and right at the front of the line are restrictions on the riskiest type of corporate loans, known as leveraged loans.
